name: nft_payout
summary: Retuns the `Payout` struct for a given `token_id` and `balance`
description: Given a `token_id` and NEAR-denominated balance, return the `Payout` struct for the given token. Panic if the length of the payout exceeds  `max_len_payout.`

params.name: balance
params.summary: The amount for the nft contract to determine payout
params.description: The amount for the nft contract to determine payout

params.name: max_len_payout
params.summary: The maximum number of accounts to pay out
params.description: The maximum number of accounts that can be paid out
